name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City West

reviews.text: Hotel was centrally located in the western part of Berlin. You can take the #109 bus from Tegel airport, get off at Uhlandstrasse, cross the street and then just a short walk to the hotel.
reviews.title: Exceptional service; great location.

reviews.text: The front desk staff was extremely helpful and professional. WiFi is free - just make sure you get the ID and password from the front desk.
reviews.title: Its the little things that make all the difference

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had the most comfortable bed in the world. Most mornings I did not want to get out of bed. The bed linens are very nice and the duvet is washed after every guest. Housekeeping was excellent - it had to be the cleanest bathroom in the world. The rooms are modern and sleek. The only place to put your clothes are in the closest. Not a problem - I had plenty of room. It was nice to see an iron and an ironing board in the closet. My room faced the courtyard and it was extremely quiet. There was an electric kettle in the room with a selection of teas and instant coffee.
reviews.title: It was all good

reviews.text: Breakfast was outstanding - bacon, eggs, sausage, pancakes, yogurt, breads, cheeses, fresh fruit, cereal, juice and a selection of coffees and teas. The staff did an excellent job to make sure everything was replenished.
reviews.title: An Excellent Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One thing I did like about the hotel was the mature clientele. No running school children to disturb the peace and quiet. Pretty much a business crowd during the week with more tourists on the weekend.
reviews.title: Close to centre

reviews.text: Four of us went to Berlin for the Christmas markets over thanksgiving. The Hampton's location could not have been better, service was very good and the pillows Devine!
reviews.title: Excellent location, service and price!

reviews.text: This was our first visit to Berlin. A superb city to explore made even better by an equaly good hotel. The staff are very friendly and have great knowledge of the city and places you want to visit. Would without hesitation stay here again
reviews.title: "great hotel"

reviews.text: This was a pleasant surprise. The staff was consistently friendly and helpful and the hotel was clean, new and well kept.
reviews.title: Good value and location - would stay again

reviews.text: The room was a fair size for 2 people, the beds were comfortable. We had a room with the train at ear level and were very pleased that it was not at all disruptive; the sound blocking was excellent.
reviews.title: I love this hotel!

reviews.text: The complimentary breakfast was very good and much appreciated when travelling to a new place on a first day where you don't know where to go yet. The location was very convienient, walkable to many attractions and a couple of blocks to the U-bahn subway station.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - Great Staff

reviews.text: I am so pleased Hampton Inns are opening up more in Europe. I travel to Berlin a lot for work, and have been waiting for a reasonably priced, good hotel to open (often they are so expensive). I saw this one had opened and used my HHonors points for a free stay to check it out.
reviews.title: Great location, great staff, great little hotel!

reviews.text: I arrived in Berlin at Tegel, caught the airport bus and got off at the main station, and then it was an easy 5 minute walk. The hotel is located just off the main shopping street of Kurfurstendamm and practically next to the Uhlandstrasse metro stop - which means you are right on the doorstep of lots of shops and restaurants, and the link to the rest of Berlin. To be fair, it's not a long walk to anywhere in Berlin centre - and it is a nice city for walking.
reviews.title: What a wonderful hotel!

reviews.text: I arrived early in the morning and my room was not available, but they were happy to securely lock my luggage away and let me use the facilities. I then went out for the day and by the time I returned my room was ready. The room was spacious, modern and well decorated. Good storage space and the bed was SO comfortable. The bathroom was modern and filled with quality toiletries. I actually had the best night's sleep ever in this hotel - amazing considering I had a nerve-racking interview the following morning.
reviews.title: Outstanding hotel, staff and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was substantial, European fayre. There was the usual cereals, fruits, cold meats and dairy items. The seating area was huge, although completely full when I was there - I found myself a sofa in front of the TV to eat, so that was okay.
reviews.title: Good budget hotel

reviews.text: Checkout was friendly and I will most definitely make this my hotel of choice when in Berlin now.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text: If you're going to berlin consider stay at Hampton by Hilton Berlin City West. I found a very comfortable accomodation with breakfast included that's very rare to find in US and Italy, the price was very competitive and the service was very excellent having the personnel a very gentle attitude for the guests. The internal room face the intrenal courtyard, but you have to consider you are staying in very Central City location: Kurfürstendamm!
reviews.title: Berlin Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed there 3 nights for the Festival of Lights. I love Hamptons the world over, but with wireless and a hot breakfast buffet thrown in, this was a great value -- far cheaper than other hotels that didn't offer those amenities. Our room was recently renovated and well appointed. Since there was a cold snap, we especially appreciated the coffee/tea kettle.
reviews.title: A comfortable stay at a comfortable price

reviews.text: It's just a few blocks down from the subway in the trendy K'damm neighborhood, which is really nice -- though subway maintenance at the time made it hard to get to from the city center.
reviews.title: Superb experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was attacked so fast the staff had trouble keeping it stocked -- especially late in the morning -- but the food was good and kept us full until dinner.
reviews.title: Very Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we had a pleasant stay, and I'd recommend it as well as stay there again.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel!!

aka: Hampton By Hilton Berlin City West Hotel
